item.title: About
item.description: Hello there fellow web enthusiast This space is where I write a little, tinker a little and showcase a little. I’ve been developing mainly in Ruby/Ruby on Rails but I have recently been bitten by the frontend bug. The result of that? Finding beauty/inspiration in places I would never have imagined :) Read more about my background here Or better yet, say hello!
